content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) waiting for source items
- Additional Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-11.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-9.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0)

### Coal Mining and Smelting Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) waiting for source items
- Additional Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure there is enough space and no collisions with existing entities when placing new entities. Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or adjusting the reference position to avoid collisions.

### Errors due to insufficient inventory items
- Verify that you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. This will prevent errors related to insufficient inventory items.

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source items are available for the inserters to pick up. Regularly check and manage the inventory of source entities to keep the production line running smoothly.
